subject: Re: [junit] Not sure if JUnit can be used how I need it... suggestions?
msgSnippet: That s a very general question. JUnit does not do much more than execute a bunch of tests and give you assertions to test. (It does give you some more fancy
messageBody:
That's a very general question.

JUnit does not do much more than execute a bunch of tests and give you
assertions to test.
(It does give you some more "fancy" tricks, like Rules and Runners as an addon.)

As long as you can write some test code that executes the not yet
written class/method in a reliable way, I think it should be possible.

Greetings,
Malte
